entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
